description: Query a list of domains, along with several additional information parameters.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: QueryExtendedDomainList
If set to 1: verbose output (more parameters)
Index of the first entry to be returned
Max. number of entries to be returned. The system has a default value for performance purposes

The parameter by which the output will be sorted. Must be one of the following:DOMAIN, DOMAINDESC, SUBCLASS, SUBCLASSDESC, USER, USERDESC, CREATEDDATE, CREATEDDATEDESC, UPDATEDDATE, UPDATEDDATEDESC, REGISTRATIONEXPIRATIONDATE, REGISTRATIONEXPIRATIONDATEDESC, REGISTRAR, REGISTRARDESC, EXPIRATIONDATE, EXPIRATIONDATEDESC, PAIDUNTILDATE, PAIDUNTILDATEDESC, NEXTACTIONDATE, NEXTACTIONDATEDESC
Depth of the list, may be SELF, SUBUSER or ALL
Shows either all assigned or all unassigned (pending transfer/trades) domains (may be 0 or 1)
Filter output for domains which match the pattern specified here, e. g. *.com, a*.de
Show only domains with these subclasses, e.g. COM for .com domains
Search for: Owner/Registrant-Contact
Search for: Admin-Contact
Search for: Tech-Contact
Search for: Billing-Contact
Search for: Nameserver
Search for: domain status
Search for: Minimal creating date
Search for: Maximal creating date
Search for: Minimal update date
Search for: Maximal update date
Search for: Minimal registration expiration date
Search for: Maximal registration expiration date
Only list domains which have been transferred after the date specified here
Only list domains which have been transferred before the date specified here
Only list domains which have a Trustee Service enabled (1) or disabled (0)
Only list domains with a certain renewal mode. Must be EXPIRE, DELETE or RENEW
